        public android.view.View getContentView()
        get the indicator content view.
        Returns:
        the view which is inside indicator.

private android.graphics.drawable.GradientDrawable getGradientDrawable()

      • getInsideContentView

        android.view.View getInsideContentView()

      • getTopContentView

        public android.view.View getTopContentView()
        get the indicator top content view. if indicator type IndicatorType is CUSTOM or CIRCULAR_BUBBLE, call this method will get a null value.
        Returns:
        the view which is inside indicator's top part, not include arrow

      • getWindowWidth

        private int getWindowWidth()

        void refreshProgressText()

      • setContentView

        public void setContentView(@NonNull
                           android.view.View customIndicatorView)
        call this method to replace the current indicator with a new indicator view , indicator arrow will be replace ,too.
        Parameters:
        customIndicatorView - a new content view for indicator.

      • setContentView

        public void setContentView(@NonNull
                           android.view.View customIndicatorView,
                           android.widget.TextView progressTextView)
        call this method to replace the current indicator with a new indicator view, indicator arrow will be replace ,too.
        Parameters:
        customIndicatorView - a new content view for indicator.
        progressTextView - this TextView will show the progress or tick text, must be found in @param customIndicatorView

      • setMargin

        private void setMargin(android.view.View view,
                       int left,
                       int top,
                       int right,
                       int bottom)

      • setProgressTextView

        void setProgressTextView(java.lang.String text)

      • setTopContentView

        public void setTopContentView(@NonNull
                              android.view.View topContentView)
        set the View to the indicator top container, not influence indicator arrow ; if indicator type IndicatorType is CUSTOM or CIRCULAR_BUBBLE, call this method will be not worked.
        Parameters:
        topContentView - the view is inside the indicator TOP part, not influence indicator arrow;

      • setTopContentView

        public void setTopContentView(@NonNull
                              android.view.View topContentView,
                              @Nullable
                              android.widget.TextView progressTextView)
        set the View to the indicator top container, and show the changing progress in indicator when seek; not influence indicator arrow; if indicator type is custom , this method will be not work.
        Parameters:
        topContentView - the view is inside the indicator TOP part, not influence indicator arrow;
        progressTextView - this TextView will show the progress or tick text, must be found in @param topContentView

      • show

        void show(float touchX)
        call this method to show the indicator.
        Parameters:
        touchX - the x location you touch, padding left excluded.

      • update

        void update(float touchX)
        update the indicator position
        Parameters:
        touchX - the x location you touch without padding left.

        void updateArrowViewLocation(int offset)

      • updateIndicatorLocation

        void updateIndicatorLocation(int offset)
